text: Kazuo Takahashi ( Takahashi Kazuo; 2 July 1930 â€“ 8 January 2022) was a Japanese politician. He was governor of Yamagata Prefecture from 1993 to 2005. Takahashi was born in Yamagata, Japan. Takahashi died on 8 January 2022 in Yamagata from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Governors of Japanese prefectures Category:Politicians from Yamagata Prefecture
title: Kazuo Takahashi (politician)
